_header: Come my dear spouse and lady free
_description: James Ryman, ‘Iam Veni Coronaberis’ — eight quatrains (abab) with this refrain and burden (bb): ‘Karissima in deliciis / Iam veni coronaberis’

CULEe112.First Lines:
Come my dere spowse and lady freeCome to thy sonne in heven
                    blis…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Of heven blis thou shalt be queneIam veni
                    coronaberis

Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.

                Literaturen
